result.reason: Connection importers currently populate credential fields directly; they should be updated to extract credentials into the Credential Manager (CredentialRepository) to promote centralization and reuse.
result.approach: Modify connection importers (e.g., Putty, RDCMan) to extract username/password/domain. Check if a matching CredentialRecord exists in the CredentialRepository; if not, create one. Link the imported ConnectionInfo to the CredentialRecord via ID instead of storing credentials directly.
